0: The only complaint I have is the bathroom sink had remnants of a back up when we checked in
Either side of the hotel has a nice view and some even have balconies
At that time the restaurant manager was in the club and I asked him to see if he could have the requested items sent to my room

Check out is noon which allowed me to have a 4 hour 1on1 breakfast meeting in the main restaurant the staff continued to bring us fresh coffee all morning and then go back to my room finish packing and check out
Return to room next day and fridge still contain contents shower has same hairs on wall and get this same darn pillowcases on pillows neatly placed on bed
Room has a coffee machine but no refrigerator
The balcony lake view room is the largest disappointment of all
We got back from the funeral and reception around 10 pm only to find that our room had not been made up
Rooms are supposed to have a refrigerator
Construction Noise Room Service Breakfast was late and wrong
1: The decor and cleanliness of the room are added bonuses
It was cool and clean and the shower was amazing
The bar area is spacious also with lots of tvs on the main level
The soundproof rooms at Dallas Mariot Las Colinas offer a seating area and cable TV
The views from the rooms are amazing and the addition of a balcony is even more amazing
The rooms were beautiful and the beds were so comfy it felt like I was sleeping on clouds lol
